name: 4,4-dimethyl-5alpha-cholest-7-en-3beta-ol,ferrocytochrome-b5:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: 4,4-Dimethyl-5alpha-cholest-7-en-3beta-ol + 6 Ferrocytochrome b5 + 3 Oxygen + 6 H+ <=> 3beta-Hydroxy-4beta-methyl-5alpha-cholest-7-ene-4alpha-carboxylate + 6 Ferricytochrome b5 + 4 H2O
